verses.text: Happy \w is|strong="H3427"\w* he whose resting-place \w is|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* secret \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w under|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w shade|strong="H6738"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* wings \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* Most High;

\w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w He|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* safe place \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* tower \w of|strong="H0430"\w* strength: \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w in|strong="H0430"\w* whom \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* hope.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w take|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* out \w of|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* bird-net, \w and|strong="H1698"\w* keep \w you|strong="H3588"\w* safe \w from|strong="H5337"\w* wasting disease.

\w You|strong="H8478"\w* \w will|strong="H3671"\w* be covered by \w his|strong="H8478"\w* feathers; \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w his|strong="H8478"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \w you|strong="H8478"\w* \w will|strong="H3671"\w* be safe: \w his|strong="H8478"\w* good \w faith|strong="H0571"\w* \w will|strong="H3671"\w* be \w your|strong="H8478"\w* salvation.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H6343"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* evil \w things|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H6343"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H6343"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* \w arrow|strong="H2671"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* flight \w by|strong="H3915"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w*,

\w Or|strong="H1980"\w* of \w the|strong="H1980"\w* disease which takes \w men|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* dark, \w or|strong="H1980"\w* of \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w destruction|strong="H6986"\w* which makes waste \w when|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* sun is high.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* see \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w falling|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w side|strong="H6654"\w*, \w and|strong="H5066"\w* \w ten|strong="H7233"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*; \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H5066"\w* \w near|strong="H5066"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Only|strong="H7535"\w* \w with|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* reward \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* evil-doers.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* said, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* hands \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Most High \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* safe resting-place;

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H0168"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* disease \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4397"\w* \w give|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* into \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w care|strong="H8104"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w angels|strong="H4397"\w* \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w wherever|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* go.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7272"\w* keep \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, \w so|strong="H6435"\w* \w that|strong="H6435"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w may|strong="H7272"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w be|strong="H5375"\w* crushed \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5375"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5921"\w* will put \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w foot|strong="H1869"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* \w and|strong="H8577"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* snake; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w young|strong="H3715"\w* \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* \w and|strong="H8577"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* great snake will be crushed \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* feet.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* given \w me|strong="H7682"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* love, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w take|strong="H3045"\w* \w him|strong="H3045"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* danger: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* put \w him|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H8034"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* place \w of|strong="H8034"\w* honour, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* kept \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H8034"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* heart.

When \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w comes|strong="H5973"\w* up \w to|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H0595"\w* \w give|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w an|strong="H7121"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H0595"\w* be \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w in|strong="H7121"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*; \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H0595"\w* \w make|strong="H3513"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w free|strong="H5973"\w* \w from|strong="H5973"\w* \w danger|strong="H6869"\w* \w and|strong="H7121"\w* \w give|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* honour.

\w With|strong="H7646"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* rewarded; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* let \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.
